results.description: Police Scotland investigates fan misbehaviour, including spitting at a match official, at Saturday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Ayr United.
results.title: Police Scotland investigates Ayr United fans after spitting at match official

results.description: Former Ayr United and Barr Construction chairman Bill Barr dies, leaving the football club "deeply saddened".
results.shortTitle: Ayr pay tribute to former chairman Barr
results.title: Bill Barr: Ayr United pay tribute as former chairman dies

thumbnail.altText: Former Ayr United chairman Bill Barr

results.description: Arbroath stun promotion-chasing Inverness CT with a thumping 3-0 win at Gayfield to move level on points with their opponents in the Scottish Championship.
results.title: Arbroath 3-0 Inverness CT: hosts cruise to shock win

results.description: Alloa climb away from the foot of the Championship with a home win over Dunfermline.
results.shortTitle: Alloa off bottom after win over Dunfermline
results.title: Alloa Athletic 2-1 Dunfermline Athletic

results.description: Queen of the South pick up their first Championship win in four games by beating Ayr at Palmerston Park.
results.shortTitle: Queens beat Ayr to end losing run
results.title: Queen of the South 3-1 Ayr United

thumbnail.altText: Gary Oliver (right) celebrates with Stephen Dobbie against Dumbarton

results.description: Substitute Shea Gordon scores twice for 10-man Partick Thistle as they beat Morton to record their first home Scottish Championship win since April.
results.shortTitle: Thistle record first home win of season
results.title: Partick Thistle 2-1 Greenock Morton: Hosts record first home win of season

results.description: Dundee United scrap their way to a 2-0 win over their city rivals to increase their lead to six points at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: United extend lead with derby victory
results.title: Dundee 0-2 Dundee United: Robbie Neilson's side win battle at Dens Park

results.description: Dundee and Dundee United meet for the second time this season with United three points clear at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.title: Scottish Championship: Dundee 0-2 Dundee Utd - Visitors ease to Tayside derby triumph

results.description: Dundee manager James McPake says extending a three-game winning run is his motivation rather than revenge for their last city derby thumping.
results.shortTitle: Points, not revenge is McPake motivation
results.title: Dundee v Dundee United: James McPake says points rather than revenge is motivation

results.description: Head coach Robbie Neilson says derby games will be vital in the Championship title race as Dundee United prepare for Friday's visit to Dens Park.
results.shortTitle: Derbies key to title - Dundee Utd boss
results.title: Dundee v Dundee United: Robbie Neilson says derbies will be key in title race

results.description: Test your knowledge on the history of Dundee derbies by trying our quiz
results.title: Dundee v Dundee Utd: Test your knowledge in our quiz

results.description: Morton kitman Andy Bryan has been given a 12-game suspension for breaching Scottish FA betting rules.
results.shortTitle: Morton kitman banned for betting breach
results.title: Morton kitman Andy Bryan given 12-game ban for gambling offences

results.description: Manager James McPake is looking for derby revenge on Friday and says he never doubted Dundee would recover from a heavy loss at Tannadice in August.
results.shortTitle: McPake had faith after derby drubbing
results.title: James McPake: Dundee boss had faith after derby drubbing

results.description: Listen to Off The Ball and relive today's Scottish Premiership action
results.title: Listen: Off The Ball

results.description: Craig Moore fires a double as Ayr United ensure a miserable return for former boss Ian McCall as they prove too strong for Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Ayr thrash Thistle on McCall return
results.title: Ayr Utd 4-1 Partick Thistle: Ian McCall loses on Somerset return

thumbnail.altText: Ayr United congratulate two-goal hero Craig Moore

results.description: Dunfermline Athletic ease past Queen of the South to record back-to-back Scottish Championship wins for the first time this season.
results.shortTitle: Dunfermline beat Queen's for back-to-back wins
results.title: Dunfermline Athletic 2-0 Queen of the South: hosts earn back-to-back wins for first tie this term

results.description: Arbroath keep up their pursuit of the Scottish Championship play-off places with a 2-1 win over fellow part-timers Alloa Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath beat Alloa to edge to play-offs
results.title: Arbroath 2-1 Alloa Athletic: hosts edge closer to play-offs

results.description: Dundee United maintain their three-point lead in the Scottish Championship with an impressive three-goal victory against Inverness Caledonian Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Dundee Utd win at Inverness to stay top
results.title: Inverness CT 0-3 Dundee Utd: Robbie Neilson's side stay top of Championship

results.description: Substitute Jamie Ness scored a fantastic late winner to gift Dundee an important home win over Greenock Morton.
results.title: Highlights: Dundee 2-1 Greenock Morton

results.description: Inverness CT manager John Robertson thinks the Scottish Championship title will not be decided by budgets despite the Dundee clubs' financial dominance.
results.shortTitle: Title 'not a battle of wage bills'
results.title: Inverness CT: Money will not decide Scottish Championship, says John Robertson

thumbnail.altText: Inverness Caledonian Thistle manager John Robertson
